body:
Some people had this problem, it is a bug?
Note: Idk if its the same with DTM and TDM / Nexus / CTH, cause im talking about CTW leaderboards...
If u c my ctw leaderboard u can c that i have the section All time, but, i know people that dont have it, examples:

http://avicus.net/srpandal
http://avicus.net/Bloodoh

Sometimes i play CTW with them, and i think this is so weird and angry :x

title: All Time Leaderboard | Bug?

replies.body: It's weird, they only show a few gamemodes that keeps changing. Sometimes it shows DTM, sometimes it show CTW
replies.body_tagged: It's weird, they only show a few gamemodes that keeps changing. Sometimes it shows DTM, sometimes it show CTW

replies.body: Ya but tue staff need to fix it :/
